title: Optical Kerning / Alignment / Optical Bounds - Samples?
content:
Does anyone have a good test document that can be used to evaluate Vertical Optical Alignment? (Not sure if this should be in ’Build’). I assume that documents like this exist, wondering if there are any classics out there that hit the hardest cases to align? Many thanks in advance for any pointers, PaulN

 [‹ Faux bold/italic substitution](http://web.archive.org/web/20071110004557/http:/www.typophile.com/node/17405 "Go to previous forum topic") [OT features for accented characters ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071110004557/http:/www.typophile.com/node/19778 "Go to next forum topic")
author: PaulN
